TopicTitle: Bulding my first full space station!

Articles.Content:
Today it was holiday on Galicia (spain) so i decided to make my first fulll SS, so here we go =D

This is pic of the electric module, with an beautiful eclypse at the background!

 

 

And now the station itself:

Here i show the parts!

BTW pls help, when i try to take control over the station the kraken attacks =C

Edited May 17, 2018 by Juanlu16

The eclipse is cool and all, but you can hardly see anything in those pics! Since you can't always take good pictures on the illuminated side, I recommend you increase the brightness a bit to take pics. It can be done in settings now, a slider called Ambient Light Boost. And put it a bit higher than you think is necessary, as the game takes the screenshots a bit darker than what it shows on screen.

 

Rune. Glad to see (more) Spanish people around here. Bienvenido al foro, compatriota!

47 minutes ago, Rune said:

Gracias shur!

Aunque está jodía la cosa, el kraken me ha matado la estacion!
